Features & Specifications

Everything you need to know about our electric cargo trikes built for farm work and off-road use

View Products Get Quote

Power & Performance

Built with robust electric systems designed for demanding farm and off-road applications

Electric Motor & Battery System

1200W Electric Motor

High-torque electric motor provides reliable power for hauling heavy loads and navigating challenging terrain.

72V Battery System

Advanced 72V lithium battery system delivers extended range and consistent performance throughout the workday.

55 Mile Range

Up to 55 miles on a single charge, perfect for extended work sessions without interruption.

Cargo & Utility Features

Designed for maximum utility with practical features that make farm work more efficient

Hydraulic Dump Bed & Cargo Capacity

1500lb Cargo Capacity

Heavy-duty steel construction supports up to 1500 pounds of cargo, tools, or produce.

Hydraulic Dump Bed

Optional hydraulic dump bed makes unloading cargo effortless - perfect for bulk materials and produce.

Modular Design

Components are modular and generic, making them easily replaceable and maintainable.

Weather Protection & Comfort

Stay comfortable and productive in all weather conditions with optional protection features

Wind & Rain Protection

Wind & Rain Screen

Optional protective screen shields you from wind and rain, keeping you dry and comfortable during work.

Wiper System

Integrated wiper system ensures clear visibility in wet conditions for safe operation.

Ergonomic Design

Comfortable seating and controls designed for extended use during long work sessions.

Performance & Safety

Built for reliability and safety in demanding farm and off-road environments

25 MPH Top Speed

Optimal speed for farm and off-road use - fast enough to be efficient, safe enough for rough terrain.

Reinforced Tires

Heavy-duty tires specifically designed for farm and off-road use, built to handle rough terrain.

2-Year Warranty

Comprehensive 2-year parts warranty with local support - we stand behind our work.

Ready to Experience These Features?

See our electric cargo trikes in action and learn how they can improve your farm work efficiency.
